alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:09AM EST until December 18 at 10:30PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River near Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river level will drop briefly this morning before rising to around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.4 feet late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 4.2 Observed Stage at Mon 7 am: 3.9 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 4.0 Mon 8 pm 1.6 Tue 2 am 0.9 Tue 8 am 0.7 Tue 2 pm 0.1 Tue 8 pm 0.9 Wed 2 am -0.6 Wed 8 am 1.6 Wed 2 pm -0.8 Wed 8 pm 1.8 Thu 2 am -1.3 &&
